title: Oliver Twist
creator_credit: Burbank Films, George Stephenson and Richard Slapczynski
brief_description: Animated adaptation of the Charles Dickens novel, aimed at younger viewers. Children can learn of the adventures of Oliver as he encounters Fagin, the Artful Dodger, Sykes and other memorable characters. Music composed and conducted by Richard Bowden. Voices include; Barbara Frawley, Robin Stewart and Wallas Eaton.
